sentence.Network_en: What a damnable climate we have!
sentence.Network_cn: 我们这的气候真是糟糕透顶！

sentence.Network_en: The charge of rape was a damnable lie.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项强奸指控完全是卑劣的谎言。

sentence.Network_en: I blush , I burn , I shudder, while I pen the damnable atrocity.
sentence.Network_cn: 写到这幕该死的暴行, 我不禁面红耳赤,不寒而栗.

damnable behaviour , crimes , etc., 恶劣的行为 , 罪行等.

" the shadow is burnt and burnt " Undoubtedly " Recoil " Last means of the lethalities getting more effective before this most increase , but- -Why does it need that damnable chip ?“暗影灼烧”无疑是“反冲”之前最有效的增加毁灭术士杀伤力的手段，但是——它为什么需要那个该死的碎片？
curious business 稀奇古怪的商店damnable business 糟透的企业dangerous business 危险的企业

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense ‘worthy of condem-nation’): from Old French dam(p)nable, from Latin dam(p)nabilis, from dam(p)nare 'inflict loss on' (see damn)

entry.tran: 该死的;可恶的;讨厌的;糟糕的
entry.def: You use damnable to emphasize that you dislike or disapprove of something a great deal.

example.ex: What a damnable climate we have!
example.tran: 我们这的气候真是糟糕透顶！

example.ex: The charge of rape was a damnable lie.
example.tran: 这项强奸指控完全是卑劣的谎言。

auth_sentence.content: We pronounce Count Guido devilish and damnable.
auth_sentence.res_content: We pronounce Count Guido devilish and damnable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We pronounce Count Guido devilish and damnable.

auth_sentence.content: Those enthusiasts who look upon every schism from the established articles of faith as damnable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those enthusiasts who look upon every schism from the established articles of faith as damnable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those enthusiasts who look upon every schism from the established articles of faith as damnable.
